domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @robreiner No offense, police brutality has been going on long before that a-hole was in the WH, and he is responsible for the Coronavirus now?  I cannot stand him being our president, but you are pointing fingers at the wrong place
